item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

The main question i have is…

Why am i getting 80,000 xp per shark?

Heres my shark code

[code]if(NPCID == 236 && playerLevel[10] >= 75)
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
startAnimation(618);
addItem(383, 1);
addSkillXP(1000*playerLevel[10], 10);
sendMessage(“You fish a shark”);
actionTimer = 14;
}

if(NPCID == 236 && playerLevel[10] < 75)
{
sendMessage(“You need a fishing level of 75 to fish shark.”);
}[\code]

  1. How would i add a switch command that changes mage book for admin only?

  2. How would i add mining? if theres a tut let me know

  3. How do i change xp per damage?

  4. Is there a way to make an area 1v1 combat, the tut i found and tried didnt work.

I know its a lot of questions, but ive been letting them build up, please help. :)[/code]

Read full topic
